publications.name: VeasyGuide: Personalized Visual Guidance for Low-vision Learners on Instructor Actions in Presentation Videos
publications.summary: A tool that uses motion detection to identify instructor actions and dynamically highlight and magnify them for low-vision learners. Won Honorable Mention Award.

publications.name: ImprovMate: Multimodal AI Assistant for Improv Actor Training
publications.summary: An AI-powered system that leverages LLMs to automate narrative stimuli generation for improvisation training, helping actors focus on creativity.

publications.name: Data Augmentation for 3DMM-based Arousal-Valence Prediction for HRI
publications.summary: A data augmentation technique using 3D morphable models to improve arousal-valence prediction accuracy in human-robot interaction settings.

publications.name: SmartLearn: Visual-Temporal Accessibility for Slide-based e-learning Videos
publications.summary: An innovative tool designed to enhance accessibility of video-based e-learning content through advanced video analysis techniques addressing focus, navigation, and pacing issues.

publications.name: MyStoryKnight: A Character-drawing Driven Storytelling System Using LLM Hallucinations
publications.summary: A storytelling system that creates adventure-type stories with multiple branches using character drawings as input and leveraging LLM hallucinations for interactive story generation.

publications.name: ShowMe: 対話的な強調表示と拡大表示によるプレゼンテーションビデオの視覚的アクセシビリティの改善
publications.summary: A tool that highlights and magnifies instructor visual actions in presentation videos to support low-vision learners, reducing frustration and fatigue.

publications.name: Smart Replay: eラーニング動画における視覚的・時間的アクセシビリティの向上
publications.summary: An e-learning accessibility tool that analyzes learning videos and generates accessible playback options. Won Helpfeel Award for Corporate Excellence.

publications.name: Task Mode: Dynamic Filtering for Task-Specific Web Navigation using LLMs
publications.summary: A system that dynamically filters web content based on user-specified goals using large language models, particularly beneficial for screen reader users.

publications.name: A Longitudinal Autoethnography of Email Access for a Professional with Chronic Illness and ADHD: Preliminary Insights
publications.summary: A 14-year autoethnography examining email accessibility challenges for professionals with chronic illness and ADHD, proposing design insights for accessible workplace communication systems.

publications.name: Confidence Estimation of Few-shot Patch-based Learning for Anime-style Colorization
publications.summary: A confidence estimation method for automatic anime colorization that compares local patches to indicate colorization confidence levels for each image region.
